title: 복습과 연결 어휘
description: A1 마무리: 이전 주차에서 배운 어휘를 복습하고 문장을 연결하는 표현을 배웁니다.

words.example: They are building a new school.

additionalExamples.sentence: He built a house last year.

words.example: I will send you an email.
I take the bus to work.
Can you show me the way?
I want to go, but I'm tired.
I was tired, so I went to bed.

additionalExamples.sentence: It was raining, so I stayed home.
I stayed home because I was sick.
I was happy when I saw you.

words.example: If you need help, call me.

additionalExamples.sentence: If it rains, I'll stay home.
I brush my teeth before bed.

words.example: I listen to music while I work.

additionalExamples.sentence: I ate, and then I slept.

words.example: I like coffee. I also like tea.

confusableWords.difference: Also는 문장 중간, Too는 문장 끝

exercises.question: I want to go, _____ I'm tired. (그러나)
What is the difference between 'also' and 'too'?
options: Also is usually in the middle, Too is at the end
exercises.answer: Also is usually in the middle, Too is at the end
exercises.explanation: 'also'는 문장 중간에, 'too'는 문장 끝에 주로 사용합니다.

exercises.question: I like coffee. I _____ like tea. (또한)
I was tired, _____ I went to bed. (그래서)
Which word is NOT a question word?
Which sentence uses 'because' correctly?
options: I'm tired because I worked all day.
exercises.answer: I'm tired because I worked all day.

exercises.question: I listen to music _____ I work. (~하는 동안)
What does 'too' mean in 'I like pizza too'?
Which sentence is about possibility?
options: If it rains, I'll stay home.
exercises.answer: If it rains, I'll stay home.

exercises.question: Which word is an adverb of degree?
Which sentence uses 'while' correctly?
options: I listen to music while I work.
exercises.answer: I listen to music while I work.

exercises.question: Which word can mean both '~도' and '너무'?
Which sentence expresses reason?
options: I'm tired because I worked all day.
exercises.answer: I'm tired because I worked all day.

pairs.left: I'm tired, ___ I went to bed.
I want to go, ___ I'm tired.

exercises.question: What does 'take' mean in 'It takes 30 minutes'?
It _____ 30 minutes. (걸린다)
exercises.explanation: 'take'는 '걸리다'라는 뜻으로 3인칭 단수 주어와 함께 takes를 사용합니다.

exercises.question: I stayed home _____ I was sick. (왜냐하면)
Which word is used in negative sentences for 'something'?
A1 복습: 주요 동사와 의미를 연결하세요.
Which sentence shows contrast?
options: I like coffee, but not tea.
I like coffee, so I drink it.
exercises.answer: I like coffee, but not tea.

exercises.question: A1 복습: Which is the correct sentence?
exercises.explanation: 영어 문장 어순: 주어 + 동사 + 부사 + 형용사
